item.description: The menu may include: Cashew and cauliflower salad (sometimes known as Amy's 'egg' salad); tabouli; dilled cucumbers; plate of fancily-cut vegetables with homemade hummus (made with sprouted chickpeas, nothing cooked); stuffed red/black or purple peppers; carrot chutney;  sprouts & avocado in raw eggplant salad on Swiss Chard, Pomegranates for desert, possibly Carrot or beet juice and salad. If you have suggestions, I'd be happy to consider them. There is no charge or $2.00 donation if the food is good.
item.name: Homemade Dinner (Malden)
